scripts.fix: npm run fix-small & npm run fix-medium & npm run fix-large
scripts.generate-small: node_modules/.bin/fantasticon icons/small -o icons -n sbb_icons_small -t ttf -g json
scripts.generate-medium: node_modules/.bin/fantasticon icons/medium -o icons -n sbb_icons_medium -t ttf -g json
scripts.generate-large: node_modules/.bin/fantasticon icons/large -o icons -n sbb_icons_large -t ttf -g json
scripts.generate: npm run generate-small && npm run generate-medium && npm run generate-large
